txt.en: 'I have but very few asks in this blood pact.'
'I wish for you take from Scatha's hoard all that you want, except for my family heirloom.'
'I also ask of you to never tell anyone where Scatha's hoard lay hidden.'
'Finally, after two long years, my father is now rightfully avenged!'
'It may take some time to find my heirloom amidst the cavern of treasures.'
'I am happy to partake in your customs, Karazgar.'
'If it is a celebration of our triumph, it is welcome indeed!'
'You want nothing more, Karazgar?! You deserve half this gold!'
'My wounds and scars ache as I confront the long-worm for the final time.'
'Then so be it, let us perform your customary blood pact. I am ready.'
'Fram, in our time together, searching for the long-worm, we have become friends and brothers.'
'I propose a blood pact to solidify our friendship, as is customary where I am from.'
'Good, good, I do not wish for us to forget this day.'
